comments.body: This is a necessary evil with Windows sometimes. Would only suggest that you try PRing this upstream. With any luck they will accept it and help maintain it.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +8,12 @@# 
# This file is intended to be used for Windows only! For other platforms, the supplied makefiles work very well.

set(PROJECT_NAME "SDL2_ttf")
project(${PROJECT_NAME})
